id: Trump to hold rallies in Mississippi on eve of Senate runoff election
paragraph: By Jamie Ehrlich, CNNUpdated 2:55 PM ET, Sat November 17, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.Washington (CNN)President Donald Trump will hold two campaign rallies in Mississippi to campaign for Republican Sen. Cindy Hyde-Smith on November 26, the day before her runoff election against Democrat Mike Espy.
